example.text: News from Congressman John Moolenaar Protecting Life Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin has directed the Department of Defense to use tax dollars to fund abortions and abortion-related travel. This is wrong.
This is a bipartisan bill I am leading with fellow Michigander, Congresswoman Debbie Dingell. It would require the VA to increase the number of patient advocates available to serve veterans.

News from Congressman John Moolenaar My Vote for the New Soo Locks On December 8, I voted for legislation authorizing the completion of a new lock at the Soo Locks. This legislation passed the House and is expected to become law later this month.

Banning Federal Oil Sales to China I also voted for legislation last week that would make it illegal for companies owned by the Chinese government to buy oil sold at auction from our nation's Strategic Petroleum Reserve. This legislation passed the House with massive bipartisan support in a 331-97 vote, as 218 Republicans and 113 Democrats voted in support.
